entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
